Events that occurred on 3 April.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1944 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 58.
1956 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 188.
1956 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 188a.
1958 - J.R.R. Tolkien, signing as "Gandalf", sends a letter to a Dutchman.
2016 - Actor Erik Bauersfeld dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
Frodo and Sam, rescued out of the fire, rest in Ithilien.
